name: io.github.lamaalrajih/kicad-mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for KiCad providing resources, tools, and prompts to interact with KiCad projects, schematics, BOMs, DRC checks, netlists, and circuit pattern recognition.

environment_variables.name: KICAD_SEARCH_PATHS
environment_variables.description: Comma-separated list of paths to search for KiCad projects.

prompts.name: create_new_component
prompts.description: Prompt for creating a new KiCad component. Provides step-by-step instructions on creating schematic symbols, footprints, and adding components to designs.

prompts.name: debug_pcb_issues
prompts.description: Prompt for debugging common PCB issues including DRC errors, ERC errors, footprint mismatches, and routing challenges.

prompts.name: pcb_manufacturing_checklist
prompts.description: Prompt for a comprehensive checklist to prepare a KiCad PCB design for manufacturing, covering design rules, layers, output files, and component placement.

tools.name: analyze_bom
tools.description: Analyze a KiCad project's Bill of Materials (BOM), providing component counts, categories, and cost estimates if available.

project_path.description: Path to the KiCad project file (.kicad_pro)

tools.name: export_bom_csv
tools.description: Export a Bill of Materials CSV file for a KiCad project using KiCad command-line tools or Python modules.

project_path.description: Path to the KiCad project file (.kicad_pro)

tools.name: get_drc_history_tool
tools.description: Retrieve the Design Rule Check (DRC) history for a KiCad project.

project_path.description: Path to the KiCad project file (.kicad_pro)

tools.name: run_drc_check
tools.description: Run a Design Rule Check on a KiCad PCB file and return results and statistics.

project_path.description: Path to the KiCad project file (.kicad_pro)

tools.name: extract_schematic_netlist
tools.description: Extract netlist information from a KiCad schematic file.

schematic_path.description: Path to the KiCad schematic file (.kicad_sch)

tools.name: extract_project_netlist
tools.description: Extract netlist from a KiCad project's schematic file.

project_path.description: Path to the KiCad project file (.kicad_pro)

tools.name: analyze_schematic_connections
tools.description: Analyze connections in a KiCad schematic including power nets, signal paths, and potential issues.

schematic_path.description: Path to the KiCad schematic file (.kicad_sch)

tools.name: find_component_connections
tools.description: Find all connections for a specific component in a KiCad project schematic.

project_path.description: Path to the KiCad project file (.kicad_pro)

tools.name: identify_circuit_patterns
tools.description: Identify common circuit patterns in a KiCad schematic such as power supplies, amplifiers, filters, oscillators, digital interfaces, microcontrollers, and sensors.

schematic_path.description: Path to the KiCad schematic file (.kicad_sch)

tools.name: analyze_project_circuit_patterns
tools.description: Identify circuit patterns in a KiCad project's schematic file.

project_path.description: Path to the KiCad project file (.kicad_pro)

tools.name: list_projects
tools.description: Find and list all KiCad projects on the system.

tools.name: get_project_structure
tools.description: Get the structure and files of a KiCad project.

project_path.description: Path to the KiCad project file (.kicad_pro)

tools.name: open_project
tools.description: Open a KiCad project in the KiCad application.

project_path.description: Path to the KiCad project file (.kicad_pro)

resources.name: circuit_patterns
resources.description: Get a formatted report of identified circuit patterns in a KiCad schematic file.

resources.name: project_circuit_patterns
resources.description: Get a formatted report of identified circuit patterns in a KiCad project.
